content:
It seems we had some friends visit our Astralink today?
I hadn't even had the chance to invite them for afternoon tea
before they slipped away...
info: 幻雪联机对主机-航路上客人刚离开_

content:
That friend who came to visit today,
I wonder when they'll come again...
I've polished all the afternoon tea sets in preparation!
info: 幻雪联机对主机-航路上客人刚离开_

content: However, I'm sure we'll have another chance to meet with <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s friends again, won't we?
info: 幻雪联机对主机-航路上客人刚离开_
